english: That is the latest news from the front .
chinese: 下面是前线报导的最新消息。

english: This store sells the latest styles in hats .
chinese: 这家商店出售最新式的帽子。

english: She always dressed in the latest fashion .
chinese: 她总是穿最新款的时装。

english: She affected all the latest styles .
chinese: 她爱炫耀一切最新式的服装。

english: Their kitchen is full of the latest gadgets .
chinese: 他们的厨房都是最新式的器具。
最新造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The reporter had a red-hot story .
chinese: 那个记者掌握着最新消息。

english: Their latest model is certain to be a winner .
chinese: 他们最新型号的产品一定很成功。

english: The last edition has been exhausted .
Our latest model should meet your requirements exactly .
chinese: 我们的最新型号包你满意。

english: This electric toothbrush is our latest promotion ...
chinese: 这种电牙刷是敝公司的最新产品。

english: Stay tuned to us for the latest sports results .
chinese: 请继续收听我们播放的最新比赛结果。
他们唱了最新流行歌曲。

english: He is very up to date in his methods of language teaching .
chinese: 他的语言教学法是最新式的。

english: What is the latest state of play in the disarmament talks ?
chinese: 裁军谈判的最新情况怎么样？
